metadata.synopsis: Dialog with Yousen, a spawn after Cazador is defeated, but spawn is not killed / left yet.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7 )Astarion - Act 3 Lower City - Black Mass Ritual - Telepor to the Ritual ChamberMake sure you don't have Astarion or leave him here.Move forward.A dialog with Cazador will start.Click on "Attack Button" or choose to attack him in the dialog.Defeat all the enemies.Cazador will fly to his sarcophagus.Click on the sarcophagus.Choose "Kill Cazadoz"Choose "Break the staff and leave the prisoners in their cells"Click on the spawn.

0.speaker: Yousen
0.text: Am I alive? I'm alive! Ha ha ha ha ha! But oh, oh, oh, for how long?

1.speaker: Yousen
1.text: Cazador, dead. I was his slave for only 60 years, but it seems like an eternity.

2.speaker: Yousen
2.text: Agh! I feel like I gargled a straight razor. But to feel anything is wonderful - wonderful!
